title: Pyke needs a serious nerf
body:
Highest win rate

4th highest ban rate

This champion is just too good. He can gank you, CC you, execute you, but you can't do anything back to him. Any damage you do to him is absorbed by his shield and then he goes invisible and disappears, stunning anyone trying to chase him. He even gets free gold on top of that to add insult to injury.

replies.body:
He should sacrifice one of two things :

1) Power on his ult (because let's admit it, he probably the best ult in the whole game right now)

2) No more sustain. Riot made it so that a tank build was ''impossible', and made him 100% squishy on purpose. Why give him so much sustain on his W... They gotta gut that sustain.

> and made him 100% squishy on purpose. Why give him so much sustain on his W... They gotta gut that sustain.

Because his Tank build was going along with his sustain, when he should just be squishy with his sustain.

> [{quoted}](name=Axxuka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:27:07.701+0000)
>
> He should sacrifice one of two things :
> 
> 1) Power on his ult (because let's admit it, he probably the best ult in the whole game right now)
> 
> 2) No more sustain. Riot made it so that a tank build was ''impossible', and made him 100% squishy on purpose. Why give him so much sustain on his W... They gotta gut that sustain.

As a Pyke one-trick myself, I think that they just need to revert his ult changes. None of us asked for this. In exchange though, and I think most Pyke mains would agree, I want my god damn AoE q back, or at the very least make the stab Q do more damage again, as some lanes you just can't get hooks off and the extra damage is nice for poking melee supports.

no lmfao, solo lane pyke was far too cancer. yes his ult change needs reverted but they also need to gut his sustain. its extremely dumb that he can take the worst trades possible and come back almost full hp. that should never be a thing. ever. and then even if you are winning lane somehow pyke just roams and ults someone and gets an absurd amount of gold and is stronger than everyone else in the game. so yes his ult needs reverted, no his q needs to stay that way for the games sake, and his sustain needs gutted. do that and he might just be a balanced champion.
I never saw a single complaint about Pyke until his ult was buffed for no reason.

> [{quoted}](name=TsunamiWave22,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-02T05:56:43.529+0000)
>
> I never saw a single complaint about Pyke until his ult was buffed for no reason.

Don't know why this is downvoted. Pyke wasn't OP until his ult buffs, he consistantly had around 50-51% winrate (which is pretty good, but his pickrate wasn't insane either) but people forget the Nunu has like a 55% winrate in every elo yet I see no posts on the boards complaining about him.

I think people want him to be nerfed really hard or gutted because he is unfun to play against, and even if he was nerfed to a balanced state, people would still complain.

Yeah, the hate for Pyke goes beyond actual balance. I don't see him as that infuriating except for his ult because of it now giving 300% effective gold. In fact I'd say his ult buffs should be reverted along with the nerfs to his uncharged Q so it's an AOE with more damage again.

> [{quoted}](name=Axxuka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:27:07.701+0000)
>
> He should sacrifice one of two things :
> 
> 1) Power on his ult (because let's admit it, he probably the best ult in the whole game right now)
> 
> 2) No more sustain. Riot made it so that a tank build was ''impossible', and made him 100% squishy on purpose. Why give him so much sustain on his W... They gotta gut that sustain.

the solution i thought of was that , during his w if he gets hard cc'ed it should immediately end either his regen or cancel his invisibility. that way you have some counterplay to it

> [{quoted}](name=Axxuka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:27:07.701+0000)
>
> He should sacrifice one of two things :
> 
> 1) Power on his ult (because let's admit it, he probably the best ult in the whole game right now)
> 
> 2) No more sustain. Riot made it so that a tank build was ''impossible', and made him 100% squishy on purpose. Why give him so much sustain on his W... They gotta gut that sustain.

Or make him even squishier so he instantly explodes.
His ult is super predictable tbh. Oh? I’m low health and Pyke is running at me? Better walk in a straight line and not dodge!

> [{quoted}](name=cars3n,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-01T23:21:27.010+0000)
>
> His ult is super predictable tbh. Oh? I’m low health and Pyke is running at me? Better walk in a straight line and not dodge!

Which wouldn't be as big as an issue if the larger-than-depicted X had to hit more than a pixel of your champ to count.

He even gets a reset if someone kills them while he's in the air, *and the gold too*. Take the training wheels off this champ and let him have actual fuck-ups

When you're low on health and Pyke runs at you and you still dont try to dodge, fine, my b

But when you're at 40% hugging turret trying to farm safetly, only for Pyke to come out of nowhere, invisible, and he just ults you, because he actually has an execution indicator, that is the shit i can't stand, why can he see the actual exact health i need to have for the execution to go off but not me? No other execution ability has that, Garen players have to know his shit if they want to risk a tower dive for an execution, same for Darius, and same for every champion with an execution ability for that matter

Why does Pyke, the one thats has the AoE, double gold, ranged, resetting execution gets to have an indicator? that is some bs

After Pyke's release they added it to Urgot and Cho. Cho used to have a small indicator around the champ but it was easy to miss however Cho's can be shielded so that's deceptive. Urgot's to me is also utter bullcrap, 25% HP, doesn't matter if you are a 6k HP Cho or 1700 Nami, less than 25% on a pretty easy to land fast skill shot and you gone. 

They need to remove those indicators entirely, make it about judging how much damage you are going to do, not give them a free pass.

Those indicators exist, because you can actually get this information from the game already (you just need point the enemy with mouse), but it is inconvenient. They don't any "free pass" that you can't get yourself if you are tryhard enough.

Lol. You can get all information from the game. That doesnt mean it's reasonable to do so. Urgot can execute at 25%. Ok. Click on cho. He has 5347 hp. Cool. 25% of that is. Um. 1337. Let's look and see if he's at 1337. Lol. Not super practical.

It might be hard for you to calc 25% on the spot, but for most people it isn't.

Then again other ults like Cho's give you exact value, so you don't even need to do that.

Far from it. Lol. The point still stands. Expecting someone to divide x thousands by 4 while accounting for hp regen is silly. If the argument is that "its okay to have an indicator because the info is accessible in game", literally every skill should contain an "this will kill" indicator. If you think every skill should have an indicator, you're not worth talking to.
i mean, a quarter of the health bar isn't that hard to estimate
I agree, but we're not talking about estimates.
It's not that hard really its the same as looking at minimap while csing at the same time or trading while looking at minimap.
If you do the math before every execution because it's as easy as looking at the minimap props to you. Surprised youre not challenger.

The issue is it allows them to 'exactly' execute you. Many other executes, like Garen, Veigar or Darius will wait until you are really low to get the ult off correctly to get the kill, they won't do it because you could be near, they'll make sure they get the kill. If anything they'll overkill you because of it. Infact many times some like Veigar will ult but because of MR the target will still survive.

Urgot and Pyke however have a big indicator saying "Ult now, you get kill. It's free money."

Immobile champs aren't going to get away, and unless you can dash, you're not going to get out of the hitzone in time.

Seeing it coming=/= actually having enough time to do a thing that matters besides cast Heal.
The fact that execution reset ult gives players extra 300 gold is broken asf in the first place

I also hate Pyke but I have to question the "highest winrate" thing.

Isn't it blitz rn?
Champ is infuriating, gut his passive.

> [{quoted}](name=booNflesruoYnaB,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-01T20:02:07.539+0000)
>
> Highest win rate
> 
> 4th highest ban rate
> 
> This champion is just too good. He can gank you, CC you, execute you, but you can't do anything back to him. Any damage you do to him is absorbed by his shield and then he goes invisible and disappears, stunning anyone trying to chase him. He even gets free gold on top of that to add insult to injury.

He's not the highest winrate though.

Sounds to me like you haven't looked up any statistics and are blindly stating he has the "highest winrate" to farm upvotes.

Oh I see... You're looking at **MIDLANE PYKE** that has a 1.1% pick rate.

 

He needs a nerf yes but stop looking at midlane pyke stats and look at support pyke.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:34:07.817+0000)

> 
> Oh I see... You're looking at **MIDLANE PYKE** that has a 1.1% pick rate.
> 
>  
> 
> He needs a nerf yes but stop looking at midlane pyke stats and look at support pyke.

ill tell you what i told another person that tried to make a reasonable post on a circle jerk upvote farming post. You can't go against the person who made the post especially if its a post about a champion needing nerfs, you will get downvoted to oblivion because you aren't feeding their narrative. People just want him gutted not adjusted or reworked because they have a one track mind "get him out of my games at cost".

I don't want him gutted.  I just want his BS resetting ult that gives his team 900 gold per kill gutted.  His ult is fine.  Getting his team 600 gold more than everyone else in the game just for pressing R isn't fine though.  Imagine if they gave Darius 600 gold for ulting someone and a teammate 300.  Their ults work in a very similar way so why can't Darius get that?  The answer to why Darius can't have it is simple.  BECAUSE IT IS BROKEN!

You literally get upvotes for lying through your fucking teeth as long as it fits the circlejerk. A while ago was a post about somebody complaining how Cassiopeia top kited his Jax after her missing every single Q and without using W and just spamming E and Phase Rush. Concluded by saying she's too mobile. Showered in upvotes. Logic.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:34:07.817+0000)
>
> He's not the highest winrate though.
> 
> Sounds to me like you haven't looked up any statistics and are blindly stating he has the "highest winrate" to farm upvotes.
> 
> Oh I see... You're looking at **MIDLANE PYKE** that has a 1.1% pick rate.
> 
>  
> 
> He needs a nerf yes but stop looking at midlane pyke stats and look at support pyke.

Totaly agreed. I'm a pyke main so the fact that people are complaining scares me a bit. If this keeps up than I might not be able to continue like I used to. I'm m6 with pyke right now sooooooo, yah. I recently discoverd that if you pick up elcktracute or hail of blades, pyke mid is unstoppable. Even with my regular supp runes pyke is too good. Makes me think Riot made him this way on purpose

Anyway, mabe pyke should get nerfed maybe be shouldn't. Who knows.
GL for summoner who faces me!{{champion:555}}

> [{quoted}](name=SlobberyBeast,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2019-10-05T14:33:23.104+0000)

Makes me think Riot made him this way on purpose

> GL for summoner who faces me!{{champion:555}}

He needs a nerf, that's for sure.

Pyke is easier to play against than Blitzcrank, I still have no clue how clue how half you guys are struggling this much.

Just play a tank if you seriously can’t handle him.

> [{quoted}](name=Sewer Side,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-01T22:51:53.857+0000)

Leona, blitz,naut and thresh are all support tanks and are all good, like tanks are not bad go and actually play them since the only people that say that are had are the ones that never play them.

> [{quoted}](name=boricCentaur1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-10-01T23:14:57.798+0000)

Sooo first you say tanks suck then I call you out for being wrong and now you say all engage champions are over tuned lol.

One all of them build tank items like what? And two they're still tanks and you're still wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=boricCentaur1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zWjnBNPE,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-02T09:39:29.546+0000)

Cut the shit you are wrong deal with it tanks are fine and you just saying a load of bs isn't going to change that.

Also again leona and basically every tank support builds ONLY those items. This is just a difference in views this is you choosing to ignore all the facts.

Do you just like being wrong?
Tbf, they are tank support items. That's pretty undeniable.
